metadata.title: Variability in Bering Sea Ice Cover as Affected by a Regime Shift in the North Pacific in the period 1947-1996
metadata.description: Published article in Journal of Geophysical Research.  Includes monthly mean time series air and sea temperatures, winds, and sea ice coverage for the Bering Sea.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The data were developed to document fluctuations in the physical environment of the Eastern Bering Sea on time scales of months to decades.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
